src:
Conte: Ini Kekalahan yang Menyakitkan
06 Nov 2019, 09:09 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Inter Milan menelan kekalahan saat berkunjung ke markas Borussia Dortmund. Sempat unggul 2-0, Inter harus mengakui kemenangan Dortmund 3-2 dalam lanjutan Liga Champions matchday keempat, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Inter unggul 2-0 pada babak pertama lewat Lautaro Martinez dan Matias Vecino. Namun, Dortmund mampu membalikkan keadaan pada babak kedua.
Achraf Hakimi menjadi bintang Dortmund dengan mencetak dua gol. Adapun satu gol Dortmund lainnya dicetak oleh Julian Brand.
Pelatih Inter, Antonio kecewa dengan kekalahan timnya. Ia mengakui jika hasil ini sangat menyakitkan bagi ia dan timnya.
â€œMalam ini merupakan ulangan dari apa yang pernah terjadi di Barcelona, bahkan mungkin lebih buruk karena kami telah unggul dua gol lebih dulu, tentu hasil ini menyakitkan," kata Conte di situs resmi klub.
text:
Conte: This is a painful defeat
Nov 6, 2019, 09:09 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Inter Milan defeat when visiting Borussia Dortmund headquarters. Had a 2-0 lead, Inter must recognize Dortmund's 3-2 victory in the fourth matchday Champions League continued on Wednesday (6/11/2019).
Inter won 2-0 in the first half through Lautaro Martinez and Matias Vecino. However, Dortmund was able to turn things around in the second half.
Achraf Hakimi became a Dortmund star by scoring two goals. Another Dortmund goal was scored by Julian Brand.
Inter coach, Antonio was disappointed with the defeat of his team. He acknowledged that this result was very painful for him and his team.
"Tonight is a repeat of what has happened in Barcelona, maybe even worse because we have two goals ahead, of course these results are painful," Conte said on the club's official website.
